name: itravelnz
tag_list: nz, travel, app, guide, tourism, zealand
overview:
The itravelnz app is a highly featured travel guide for New Zealand including detailed travel information with GPS locations, high quality images, traveller reviews and more.

New for iPhone and for Android this free travel guide app already features hundreds of points of interest, as well as cafes, accommodations and activities located across New Zealand.

The itravelnz app features many new and user-friendly features that make it the best travel app available. Every tourism listing of accommodation, activity or attraction is geo located, so travel New Zealand and find local information, located on the map. Itravelnz users navigate with confidence to the destination with Metroview, Tomtom, Sygic and more popular navigation apps. Great for New Zealand roadtrips, unlike other regional New Zealand travel apps for Auckland, Wellington or Queenstown itravelnz is an app for all New Zealand.

A useful app for a travelling holiday in New Zealand by campervan or rental car, the itravelnz app will be helpful in planning your travel, looking for places to visit, restaurants and cafes and activities to do. There are reviews from other travellers, you can check-in, get travel deals and coupons for travel products.

Whether you have just arrived in Auckland, Queenstown or Rotorua, for a short or a long holiday itravelnz will be loaded with travel information to help your stay. This app replaces maps, chunky and outdated guidebooks and it fits in your pocket, always with you.

Better than a foreign language guide to New Zealand, this app can translate to nearly 40 languages, helpful for foreign travellers.
